title: Book Cover, "Bookjacket for "The New Churches of Europe" by G.E Kidder Smith", ca. 1961
title_raw: Bookjacket for "The New Churches of Europe" by G.E Kidder Smith
medium: Lithograph on off-white coated wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on the back cover at bottom center in black ink: Elaine Lustig
On front cover at lower left in red ink: The New Churches of Europe
At top center in black ink: G.E Kidder Smith 
On back cover at lower center in red ink: nuevas iglesias de europa 
At center of spine vertically in red ink: The New Churches of Europe/ (in black ink) G.E Kidder Smith/Holt/ Rinehart/ Winston
provenance: Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff; 1993: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Book cover for "The New Churches of Europe." Both front and back cover have black lines intersecting as a cross. On the front cover are 4 paragraphs of text explaining the content of the book. On the back cover is a photograph and credentials of the author.

tombstone.epitaph: Book Cover, "Bookjacket for "The New Churches of Europe" by G.E Kidder Smith", ca. 1961. Lithograph on off-white coated wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-52.
